name: Hospitality House
description: Hospitality House is a community center serving residents of the Tenderloin, SOMA, and Mid-Market. The Hospitality House on Turk Street is a walk-in center that provides access to phones, phone-charging stations, email, mail service, restrooms, and weekly groceries. Toiletries (such as razors, feminine hygiene products) are also given free-of-charge to the homeless community. Laundry tickets for a nearby laundromat and pods are provided at this location as well.
